reviews.review_msg: Brilliant professor who expects engagement. Take detailed notes, attend class, and work hard - the challenging exams force critical thinking. Unstuckstudy AI was a great study aid alongside the free textbook.

I took a total of four(4) classes with Allan at SFU and Douglas. He is brilliant, and yes traditional. Avoid if you have a short attention span and just want "nice". You must attend class, take notes and work. Earn his respect and he will respect you. Exams are different than quizzes, forcing you to think Critically. Take him if you want to LEARN.
